backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI updates to DestinationDetailPage.tsx with related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files covering global styles, config, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout setup with header, footer, mobile nav, theme provider, and routes for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateCtaPlac: Card-based placeholder CTA component with title, description, and a disabled external-link style button.
frontend/src/components/CinematicHero.ts: Cinematic hero section with parallax layers, autoplaying video logic, atmospheric overlays, and scroll navigation.
Interactive destination card with hover animations, budget/status badges, tags, and link-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/HeroLineSketchOv: Renders an SVG overlay with animated gradient contour lines that adjust complexity based on mobile detection.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveIndia: Displays an interactive India map with clickable regions that show tooltips and scroll to related sections.
frontend/src/components/MasonryGrid.tsx: Simple wrapper component applying a masonry layout class to its children.
Provides a fixed mobile bottom navigation bar with icons that highlight based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/MotionReveal.tsx: Animates children into view using an intersection observer-triggered fade and slide effect.
frontend/src/components/RippleButton.tsx: Extends a button with a click ripple animation by rendering timed ripple spans.
Fades content during route transitions by listening to router load events.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site’s footer with branding, navigation links, resources, and credits.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation, scroll-based styling, and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/SocialProofGalle: Scrollable horizontal gallery of user-generated travel photos styled as polaroids.
frontend/src/components/TagChip.tsx: Displays a styled tag chip with an icon based on the tag type.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown-based theme switcher allowing light, dark, or system mode selection.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Shows a set of trust badges with icons representing verified and curated features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionReveal: Exposes a ref and visibility flag using IntersectionObserver to reveal elements when they enter the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Applies a scroll‑based parallax transform to a referenced element with motion‑reduction and performance checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning actor state for future backend query integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color theme with light/dark palettes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders a blog listing page with a featured post, multiple post previews, and animated reveal components.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post using mock data, including metadata, HTML content, and navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPage.tsx: Renders a budget-based trip planning page with budget ranges, destination lists, and travel tips using cards and animated reveals.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community features like sharing stories, getting advice, finding buddies, and a coming-soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationDetailPage: Shows detailed information for a specific destination including hero image, snapshot stats, description, and travel details.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationsPage.tsx: Lists all destinations with search, category filtering, and responsive layout using cards and tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a cinematic hero, featured destinations, interactive map, and budget categories.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, design direction, architectural constraints, and existing features for building a cinematic, youth-focused travel discovery platform with no email-related functionality. Includes UI/UX guidelines, performance requirements, motion rules, and future scalability considerations.
